duties_responsibilities.duty: Installs, troubleshoots, and repairs electrical systems.
Familiar with NEC codes, follows instructions, and demonstrates a leadership mindset.
Running PVC, EMT, Rigid, and Flexible conduit with 90' bends, offsets, kicks & saddles.
Measuring, cutting, bending, threading, assembling, and installing electrical conduit.
Pulling wiring through conduit assisted by Apprentice.
Splicing wire, stripping insulation, twisting wires together, and applying tape or terminal caps.
Running cable tray and lifting up to 50 lbs.
Training and instructing apprentice level electricians.
Completing tasks efficiently with attention to detail, following written and verbal instructions, and using equipment and tools properly and safely.
Complying with all company policies, procedures, and safety requirements.
